REQUIRES FIRESPITTER PACK TO WORK!

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220252-firespitter

The Curtiss-Wright XP-55 Ascender (company designation CW-24) was a 1940s United States prototypefighter aircraft built by Curtiss-Wright. Along with the Vultee XP-54 and Northrop XP-56, it resulted from United States Army Air Corps proposal R-40C issued on 27 November 1939 for aircraft with improved performance, armament and pilot visibility over existing fighters; it specifically allowed for unconventional aircraft designs. A highly unusual design for its time, it had a canard configuration, a rear mounted engine, swept wings and two vertical tails. Because of its pusher design, it was sarcastically referred to as the "***-ender".<sup id="cite_ref-1">[1]</sup> Like the XP-54, the Ascender was initially designed for the Pratt & Whitney X-1800 engine and had to be redesigned when that engine project was cancelled. It would also be the first Curtiss fighter aircraft to use tricycle landing gear.

Youtube Video -->

Bonus! i made a curtiss xp-55 with 20 mm cannons and 4 50cal guns on it! if you have infinitedices skillful mod you can have guns on it, i have 2 files in the folder, the stock with firespitter. and one with infinitedices skillful
